name: Wild Horse Ride
description: This is a one-of-a-kind challenging ride up through the massive mountains bordering the city of Puerto Vallarta. On your 5 hour horseback ride you will race along the mountain edges and visit a hidden waterfall. We will take a break at this waterfall to relax and swim in the natural water pools situated above this magnificent waterfall (please note waterfall might not have water in it during April, May & June).
